title: Bare Minimums, Pumpkin Spice Timelines 8.19.20
itunes:title: Bare Minimums, Pumpkin Spice Timelines 8.19.20
description:
In episode 697, Miles and guest host Laci Mosley are joined by Permission To Speak host Samara Bay to discuss who is speaking at the RNC, Michelle Obama's speech at the DNC, WAP shaking the world, the Ellen Degeneres outing some producers, the return of the Pumpkin Spice Latte, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Covington graduate Nicholas Sandmann to speak at Republican convention
  2. St. Louis Couple Rewarded for Waving Guns at Protesters With GOP Convention Speaking Role
  3. Fox's Chris Wallace lauds Michelle Obama convention speech: 'Really flayed, sliced and diced Donald Trump'
  4. Trump lashes out at Michelle Obama over address at Democratic convention
  5. Great News for Cardi B, Megan Thee Stallion, and Good Pussy
  6. ‘The Ellen DeGeneres Show’ Ousts Three Top Producers (EXCLUSIVE)
  7. Dunkin' will unveil its new fall menu earlier than ever
  8. Starbucks to reintroduce Pumpkin Spice Latte, expand curbside pickup
  9. Starbucks and Dunkin' are starting Pumpkin Spice season earlier than ever, as customers grow desperate for 2020 to end
  10. America's Pumpkin Spice Habit Is Big Business
  11. Pumpkin Spice Spiked Seltzer Is Here, And It's All I'm Drinking This Fall
  12. The Pandemic Is No Match for the Pumpkin Spice Latte
  13. WATCH: Sao Paulo - Lapti

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
